name: Untamed Horse
description:
You just got your new horse however he is out of control!

Shoot apples by left clicking. 

Teach your horse to follow your directions by holding the movement (WASD) keys when the horse is running towards it's food. This will associate the movement with the key. 

Teach it to jump by holding SPACE while he is jumping. 

When you think he is tamed enough you can try completing the obstacles course.  (No apples there)

Made by Besm and Mestiez.

Made in our custom engine: Nurose.
